name: Mark Sterlin
description: HMM how do you describe yourself. I’m not tall, I’m not dark, but I’ve been told I’m handsome. I’m down to earth. Shy at first, very simple and liberal person. Life is way to short to sweat the small stuff. I’m looking for a long-term relationship or marriage. I’m not afraid of commitment. I will compliment you when the time is right. I don’t have a problem telling you when I like something. Even if it’s a friendly compliment. I’m a very good listener.
